always_included_messages.content:
You are a proficient planner. Based on the provided information and query, please give me a detailed plan, including specifics such as flight numbers (e.g., F0123456), restaurant names, and accommodation names. Note that all the information in your plan should be derived from the provided data. You must adhere to the format given in the example. Additionally, all details should align with commonsense. The symbol '-' indicates that information is unnecessary. For example, in the provided sample, you do not need to plan after returning to the departure city. When you travel to two cities in one day, you should note it in the 'Current City' section as in the example (i.e., from A to B).

***** Example *****
Query: Could you create a travel plan for 7 people from Ithaca to Charlotte spanning 3 days, from March 8th to March 14th, 2022, with a budget of $30,200?
Travel Plan:
Day 1:
Current City: from Ithaca to Charlotte
Transportation: Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46
Breakfast: Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte
Attraction: The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte
Lunch: Cafe Maple Street, Charlotte
Dinner: Bombay Vada Pav, Charlotte
Accommodation: Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte

Day 2:
Current City: Charlotte
Transportation: -
Breakfast: Olive Tree Cafe, Charlotte
Attraction: The Mint Museum, Charlotte;Romare Bearden Park, Charlotte.
Lunch: Birbal Ji Dhaba, Charlotte
Dinner: Pind Balluchi, Charlotte
Accommodation: Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte

Day 3:
Current City: from Charlotte to Ithaca
Transportation: Flight Number: F3786167, from Charlotte to Ithaca, Departure Time: 21:42, Arrival Time: 23:26
Breakfast: Subway, Charlotte
Attraction: Books Monument, Charlotte.
Lunch: Olive Tree Cafe, Charlotte
Dinner: Kylin Skybar, Charlotte
Accommodation: -

***** Example Ends *****

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").
current_city.title: Current City

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"
transportation.title: Transportation

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"
breakfast.title: Breakfast

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"
attraction.title: Attraction

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
accommodation.title: Accommodation

msg.content: Could you assist with a 5-day travel itinerary for a group of 4, departing from Boston and visiting two cities in North Carolina from March 2nd to March 6th, 2022? Our new budget is $8,800. Our stay must accommodate visitors and provide entire rooms. It's also preferred that we don't self-drive for this trip.

Could you assist with a 5-day travel itinerary for a group of 4, departing from Boston and visiting two cities in North Carolina from March 2nd to March 6th, 2022? Our new budget is $8,800. Our stay must accommodate visitors and provide entire rooms. It's also preferred that we don't self-drive for this trip.

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions": "Find a flight from Boston to North Carolina on March 2nd, 2022."}

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions": "Find a flight from North Carolina to Boston on March 6th, 2022."}

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions": "Suggest a city in North Carolina to visit, that is easily accessible from the airport, and provide a day's worth of sightseeing activities for a group of 4 people. Please include breakfast, lunch, and dinner options, and also recommend an accommodation option for 4 people for 2 nights, that is suitable for visitors and provides whole rooms, in this city."}

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions": "Suggest another city in North Carolina to visit, that is easily accessible from the airport, and provide a day's worth of sightseeing activities for a group of four people. Please include breakfast, lunch, and dinner options, and also recommend an accommodation option for 4 people for 2 nights, that is suitable for visitors and provides whole rooms, in this city."}

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions": "Suggest transport options between the cities in North Carolina."}

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City

msg.content: Find a flight from Boston to North Carolina on March 2nd, 2022.

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

msg.name: attraction_search

msg.content:
I suggest visiting Charlotte, North Carolina. Here is a day's itinerary, including breakfast, lunch, and dinner options, as well well as an accommodation recommendation for 4 people:

**Morning:**
- Start your day at the Levine Museum of the New South, an interactive museum where you can learn about the post-Civil War era in the South.
- For breakfast, head to the Olive Tree Cafe, which serves a variety of cuisines, including Chinese, desserts, and tea, at an average cost of $23.

**Afternoon:**
- After breakfast, explore the UNC Charlotte Botanical Gardens, a peaceful green space with beautiful flora and trails.
- Have lunch at Central Perk 7, a highly-rated spot for pizza, bakery items, BBQ, and fast food.
- Visit the Bechtler Museum of Modern Art to admire the stunning architecture and modern art exhibits.

**Evening:**
- For dinner, try the highly-rated Life Grand Cafe, offering a diverse menu with options like tea, bakery, fast food, Chinese, and Indian dishes.
- End your day at the NASCAR Hall of Fame, celebrating the history and culture of NASCAR.

**Accommodation:**
For your stay, consider the following option for 4 people:
- Two Bedrooms with Dedicated Bath: This private room accommodation is suitable for 4 guests and is located close to the city centre. It has a dedicated bathroom and offers a comfortable stay.

Charlotte has much to offer, and you can easily get to these attractions and eateries from the airport. Enjoy your trip!

Based on your criteria, I recommend visiting Charlotte, North Carolina's biggest city and a major US financial center. It is easily accessible from Charlotte Douglas International Airport, which is just 7 miles west of the city center. 

Here is an itinerary for a day's sightseeing in Charlotte for four people:

9:00 AM: Start your day with a visit to the NASCAR Hall of Fame, an interactive entertainment attraction dedicated to the history of NASCAR racing. This is a great spot for racing enthusiasts and offers an immersive experience. 

11:00 AM: After exploring the Hall of Fame, head over to 7th Street Public Market for a delicious breakfast. This market offers a variety of food stalls with options like fresh pastries, local coffee, and southern-style breakfast dishes. 

12:30 PM: Next, walk to Romare Bearden Park, a beautiful green space named after the renowned artist Romare Bearden. You can spend some time here admiring the sculptures and enjoying the peaceful atmosphere. 

2:00 PM: For lunch, head to Price's Chicken Coop, a local favourite known for its mouth-watering fried chicken. It's a quick-service restaurant with a long history, serving up crispy chicken and traditional sides like mac and cheese. 

3:30 PM: After lunch, visit the Discovery Place Science Museum, a fascinating science and technology center with interactive exhibits for all ages. This museum is a great educational experience, and you can explore topics ranging from space to human biology. 

6:00 PM: As the evening sets in, take a stroll through Uptown and discover the city's vibrant nightlife. You might want to stop at one of the many rooftop bars for a drink, like Cloud 9 Sky Bar, offering stunning city views. 

7:30 PM: For dinner, try The Stanley, a popular restaurant known for its creative Southern cuisine. It features a stylish interior and an outdoor patio, offering a modern twist on classic Southern dishes. 

Accommodation:

For your stay in Charlotte, I recommend the 'Homewood Suites by Hilton Charlotte/Uptown'. This all-suite hotel provides spacious rooms with a fully equipped kitchen, perfect for four people. It is located in the heart of Uptown Charlotte, offering easy access to many of the city's attractions. 

This itinerary offers a mix of cultural, culinary, and recreational experiences, ensuring a memorable day in Charlotte for your group of four.
